title: Carnival Jhin skin concept
body:
https://65.media.tumblr.com/d109076c1117d5695e1027a3643eba92/tumblr_odphqc1zoP1vuunv8o1_1280.png

I've made a quick design for a Carnival of Venice inspired Jhin skin. I thought the theme would fit his theatrical aesthetic very well!
(Click through for a bigger version of the image!)

replies.body: Love this idea!! A Venetian Carnival theme would be killer on Jhin. I'd love a sort of venetian aristorcratic inspired "Masquerade" skin line with poised champs like Jhin, LeBlanc, Fiora etc. all in masks.

> [{quoted}](name=Hylia,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=O7oZIMfZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-09-18T22:21:43.991+0000)
>
> Love this idea!! A Venetian Carnival theme would be killer on Jhin. I'd love a sort of venetian aristorcratic inspired "Masquerade" skin line with poised champs like Jhin, LeBlanc, Fiora etc. all in masks.

Oh damn, I can totally see LB and Fiora wearing something like this!

nice,
we need more Jhin skins
it looks super good, would probably be a 750 like the warden line too since I can't see them changing the particles much/at all for this skin.

> [{quoted}](name=MoonshadeRequiem,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=O7oZIMfZ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2016-09-19T05:40:51.832+0000)
>
> it looks super good, would probably be a 750 like the warden line too since I can't see them changing the particles much/at all for this skin.

Thanks a lot! I like his classic floral particles, but I could also imagine firework/glitter/confetti effects looking pretty with this.
I would take off the hump. The cowboy skin doesn't have it and I don't like it
Shit, when i saw the word "Carnival" this is the last thing the properly came to mind. This fits him incredibly well though. Props.
